-AXK0BIPSaY.title: Introduction to Screencasts
-AXK0BIPSaY.description: A quick look at what screencasts are and why we are using them for engineering courses. Please explore our playlists for topics in fluids, thermodynamics, heat transfer, kinetics, and much more. Examines the expansion of water in a piston-cylinder device when heat is added to the system.  Made by faculty at the University of Colorado Boulder, Department of Chemical and Biological Engineering.
